20101221030623.000|20101221030625.000|CC1|ON TAXES AND PATIENT'S BILL OF  
20101221030625.000|20101221030627.000|CC1|RIGHTS THAT IN THE PAST THEY    
20101221030627.000|20101221030628.000|CC1|AGREED WITH HIM ON.

20101221030630.000|20101221030632.000|CC1|HE LOST OBAMA, HE WOULD BECOME A
20101221030632.000|20101221030633.000|CC1|NASTY, ANGRY MAN.

20101221030651.000|20101221030652.000|CC1|WHICH MANY PEOPLE THOSE.        
20101221030652.000|20101221030655.000|CC1|>> ANNA MARIE, LET'S CONSIDER   
20101221030655.000|20101221030657.000|CC1|HIS MAVERICK HISTORY.           
20101221030657.000|20101221030659.000|CC1|LAST APRIL HE SAID, "I NEVER

20101221030701.000|20101221030703.000|CC1|SERVES THE PEOPLE OF ARIZONA TO 
20101221030703.000|20101221030706.000|CC1|THE BEST OF HIS ABILITIES."

20101221030708.000|20101221030712.000|CC1|HIMSELF ON THE CAMPAIGN TRAIL IN

20101221030732.000|20101221030734.000|CC1|CAN PLAY IT.

20101221030735.000|20101221030737.000|CC1|THERE LITTLE PEOPLE INSIDE

20101221030744.000|20101221030746.000|CC1|HIM THAN CLIFF IS.              
20101221030746.000|20101221030748.000|CC1|BUT THE OPERATIVE WORD IS       
20101221030748.000|20101221030755.000|CC1|PROTECT BITTER RATHER THAN      
20101221030755.000|20101221030756.000|CC1|AMNESIAC.

20101221030757.000|20101221030757.000|CC1|BEEN DONE TO HIM.               
20101221030757.000|20101221030759.000|CC1|HE CHANGES HIS MIND ON ISSUES   
20101221030759.000|20101221030801.000|CC1|LIKE CLIMATE CHANGE,            
20101221030801.000|20101221030802.000|CC1|IMMIGRATION, RELATIONSHIPS WITH 
20101221030802.000|20101221030803.000|CC1|VIETNAM.

20101221035729.000|20101221035730.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE LOVED TO SQUEEZE IN. 
20101221035730.000|20101221035731.000|CC1|>> THAT'S A GREAT QUESTION.
